name: Y Combinator
description: A seed money startup accelerator that has launched over 2,000 companies.

description: Individuals who start and build startups.

description: A company with an obvious path to a huge market.

name: Apple
description: A successful company that started with a larval market in personal computers.

description: Co-founder of Apple who wanted a computer.

description: Founder of Facebook who wanted to engage online with college friends.

name: Larry Page
description: Co-founder of Google who wanted to find things on the web.

description: Co-founder of Google who wanted to find things on the web.

name: Airbnb
